pageTitle: Will This Downgrade Hurt Halliburton (HAL) Today? (Update) - TheStreet
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {16693=Update (9:45 a.m.): Updated with Monday market open information., 10352=Access the tool that DOMINATES the Russell 2000 and the S&P 500., 16047="HAL has increased over 11% in the past month versus a 1.4% decline for the OSX and a slight (less than 1%) decline for the S&P 500," Wells Fargo wrote in a research note. "As HAL is now approaching our $56-58 valuation range, we are downgrading the stock to Market Perform from Outperform. We are making no changes to our current estimates of $4.02/$5.02 for 2014/2015."}
